settings.proxyHint:
Each proxy configuration should be on a new line.
Format: protocol=proxy_address
Example:
http=http://127.0.0.1:7890
https=http://127.0.0.1:7890
socks5=socks5://127.0.0.1:7890
settings.unsupportedProxyProtocol: Unsupported proxy protocol. Please use http, https, socks4, or socks5
settings.invalidProxyPort: Invalid proxy port number (must be a number between 1 and 65535)
settings.socksPortRequired: A SOCKS proxy must specify a port number

sketch.title: Sketch Editor

guide.title: Sketch or Figma Design to Code Guide
guide.uploadTitle: Upload Your Sketch or Figma Design
guide.description: Simply upload your Sketch or Figma design, and we'll automatically generate high-quality frontend code for you.
guide.supportText: Supports .sketch or .figma file format, file size up to 10MB

slide0.title: Select Design Area to Generate
slide0.description: After uploading -> Click file in left tree or click design area to select -> Preview appears in bottom right -> Click bottom right button to get code

slide1.title: Auto-generate High-quality Code
slide1.description: Wait a moment while our AI engine analyzes your design and generates precise frontend code

slide2.title: Instant Preview
slide2.description: See the generated code in action!!!

sketch.prompt:
1. Encapsulate components based on images when possible; 2. Use blob links for images; 3. Create a 1:1 replica of the image, refer to margins, sizes, fonts and backgrounds in the JSON array! 4. Use TypeScript; 5. For repeating elements in the image, use components when possible without breaking the original style; 6. Use text overflow styles, identify single/multi-line text, truncate with '...' for overflow to maintain aesthetics; 7. Use
tags, avoid

etc.; 8. Simplify CSS names, prefer flex layout over absolute positioning when possible; 9. Fix z-index issues where needed; 10. Maintain precise spacing as per reference data. Important: Don't omit any code!!!!

prompts.base: Please generate based on the uploaded design
prompts.react: React code using TypeScript and Tailwind CSS, project must have a start entry, and ensure the project can run, and ensure the code is符合最佳实践和性能优化。
prompts.vue: Vue3 code using TypeScript and Composition API, with Tailwind CSS styling, ensuring Vue best practices.
prompts.miniprogram: WeChat Mini Program code using the native framework with WXSS styling, following Mini Program development standards and best practices. Use rpx units for the interface, and remove the status bar if present in the design. 写小程序注意样式和宽度
